Name: Five Steps From Hell
About the game: Inspired by Resident Evil and Evil Dead, Five Steps From Hell is a first person psychological horror game with survival elements and action in the mix. *The Story The has been movie star Daniel comes home to find out that his long time stalker have found his secret location and she is literally ready to raise hell to be with him. *Gameplay -Fight demon zombies with melee or guns. -Solve problems/puzzles to progress. -Survive by finding ammo and health kits. *Game length: Five chapters, each chapter takes around 15-25 minutes depending on playstyle. Saving: Checkpoint saving. Starting a new game creates a savefile, if the player starts a new game a second time the savefile will overridden. Controls: Only supports keyboard and mouse for now.
